content:
During the last day, the Aviation of Defense forces has struck 10 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and military equipment of the invaders.

About thisreportedThe General Staff of the Armed Forces.

Divisions of rocket troops have led to:

  • 2 areas of concentration of personnel,
  • 1 Air Defense Defense Remedy,
  • 1 Station of Reb,
  • 3 UAV management points,
  • 1 more important enemy object.

Our warriors continue to be active in the occupation troops of losses in living strength and equipment, depleting the enemy along the entire line of combat collision.

As reportedArmyinform60 combat clashes took place during the last day. The enemy continues to attack six directions.
title: Aircraft and rocket launchers have thinned rows
description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces. Divisions of rocket troops have led to: 2 ...
